name: Seek Of Peace: Cold WW2
description:
Description

In this Tower Defense game on the World War II, the player must take the role or Roosevelt or Stalin, two of the leaders who took part in the Allied group.

Players must survive to the final attack of the Nazis while the time period indicated in the gameplay, a period that will run out when Hitler is dead. Furthermore, the pursuit of the leaders for peace will boost an early Cold War: players can send troops that will infiltrate across the battlefield and attack the other player.

The game presents 4 different epilogues that are generated based on the survival or not the players in the final conflict.

Features singleplayer, multiplayer (passing IP on LAN network) and multiplayer splitscreen modes.

Official website: https://coldww2.wordpress.com/

Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/coldww2/
